DOC.criteria: ICF sign Diagnosis PAR 612 month great 12 year old Decreased nasal NO value baseline Compliance ability perform maneuver responsibilities Oral systemic steroid 60 day prior Inhaled , nasal , nebulized steroid w/i 4 week Hospitalization life threaten asthma Use nasal oral antihistamine w/i 4 week Upper low airway infection Direct cigarette smoke exposure
